TITLE: Secret Level (2024)
GENRE: Science-Fiction, Animation, Action & Adventure, Fantasy, Epic Fantasy
DESCRIPTION: Fifteen standalone stories explore the history of famous video game franchises. Featuring legendary series such as Pac-Man, Warhammer 40,000, Armored Core, and more, this series tells unique stories from beloved video game lore. Each story is an individual tale of vivid imagination and awesome action from the creators of Love, Death & Robots.

TITLE: 7Seeds (2019)
GENRE: Animation, Science-Fiction, Drama, Action & Adventure, Horror, Romance, Classic Japanese Anime
DESCRIPTION: Shy Natsu awakens as part of a group chosen to ensure the survival of humanity. Together, they have to survive on a changed Earth.

TITLE: Aggretsuko(2018)
GENRE: Animation, Comedy, Music & Musical, Romance, Drama, Classic Japanese Anime
DESCRIPTION: Frustrated with her thankless office job, Retsuko the Red Panda copes with her daily struggles by belting out death metal karaoke after work.

TITLE: Arcane (2021)
GENRE: Animation, Action & Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Science-Fiction, Video Game, Modern Anime
DESCRIPTION: Amid the stark discord of twin cities Piltover and Zaun, two sisters fight on rival sides of a war between magic technologies and clashing convictions.

TITLE: Blue Eye Samurai (2023)
GENRE: Mystery & Thriller, Animation, Drama, History, Action Adventure
DESCRIPTION: Driven by a dream of revenge against those who made her an outcast in Edo-period Japan, a young warrior cuts a bloody path toward her destiny.

TITLE: Cowboy Bebop (1998)
GENRE: Animation, Action & Adventure, Science-Fiction, Western, Comedy, Drama, Classic Japanese Anime
DESCRIPTION: In 2071, roughly fifty years after an accident with a hyperspace gateway made the Earth almost uninhabitable, humanity has colonized most of the rocky planets and moons of the Solar System. Amid a rising crime rate, the Inter Solar System Police (ISSP) set up a legalized contract system, in which registered bounty hunters, also referred to as 'Cowboys', chase criminals and bring them in alive in return for a reward.

TITLE: Cyberpunk: Edgerunners (2022)
GENRE: Action & Adventure
DESCRIPTION: David Martinez is a mercenary outlaw. Fitted with speedware, the young inhabitant of the unforgiving Night City becomes an Edgerunner after personal tragedy strikes. Set in a deeply unequal society, Night City is metropolis run by corporations for the wealthy. David is a Cyberpunk, using body-modification and technology to boost his abilities and he works outside the law to plot his escape from Night City. With fellow mercenary Lucy, a netrunner who introduced him to the underworld, David is not alone on this mission and a little help goes a long way when trying to survive as a Cyberpunk in Night City.

TITLE: Eden (2021)
GENRE: Drama, Science-Fiction, Animation, Reality TV, Action & Adventure, Kids & Family
DESCRIPTION: Thousands of years in the future, a city known as Eden 3 is inhabited solely by robots whose former masters vanished a long time ago. On a routine assignment, two farming robots accidentally awaken a human baby girl from stasis questioning all they were taught to believe -- that humans were nothing more than a forbidden ancient myth. Together, the two robots secretly raise the child in a safe haven outside Eden.

TITLE: ERASED (2016)
GENRE: Drama, Mystery & Thriller, Animation, Crime, Fantasy, Science-Fiction, Modern Anime
DESCRIPTION: Satoru Fujinuma is a struggling manga artist who has the ability to turn back time and prevent deaths. When his mother is killed he turns back time to solve the mystery, but ends up back in elementary school, just before the disappearance of his classmate Kayo.

TITLE: Exception (2022)
GENRE: Science-Fiction, Mystery & Thriller, Animation, Drama, Horror, Modern Anime
DESCRIPTION: In a distant future where humans are forced to leave Earth, a spacecraft carrying a 3D-printed crew of specialists is sent to terraform a new planet.

TITLE: Hunter Ã— Hunter (1999)
GENRE: Animation, Comedy, Drama, Science-Fiction, Action & Adventure, Fantasy, Classic Japanese Anime
DESCRIPTION: Hunter x Hunter is a 1999 television series and is part of the Hunter Ã— Hunter media franchise. The story focuses on a young boy named Gon Freecss, who one day discovers that the father he had always been told was dead is in fact alive and well. He learns that his father, Ging, is a famous "Hunter": an individual who has proven themself an elite member of humanity. Despite the fact that Ging left his son with his relatives in order to pursue his own dreams, Gon becomes determined to follow in his father's footsteps, pass the rigorous "Hunter Examination", and eventually find his father to become a Hunter in his own right.

TITLE: Invincible (2021)
GENRE: Action & Adventure, Drama, Animation, Science-Fiction, Fantasy, Mystery & Thriller
DESCRIPTION: Mark Grayson is a 17-year-old with superpowers. Heâ€™s working hard to develop his skills and become a fully-fledged superhero but constantly lives in the shadow of his father - who is the most powerful superhero on the planet. As Mark continues to hone his craft, he realizes that his father may not be quite as heroic as he had believed.

TITLE: Jujutsu Kaisen
GENRE: Fantasy, Mystery & Thriller, Animation, Action & Adventure, Science-Fiction, Classic Japanese Anime
DESCRIPTION: A boy swallows a cursed talisman - the finger of a demon - and becomes cursed himself. He enters a shaman's school to be able to locate the demon's other body parts and thus exorcise himself.

TITLE: Monster (2004)
GENRE: Animation, Drama, Crime, Mystery & Thriller, Classic Japanese Anime
DESCRIPTION: Kenzou Tenma, a Japanese brain surgeon in Germany, finds his life in utter turmoil after getting involved with a psychopath that was once a former patient.

TITLE: Neon Genesis Evangelion (1995)
GENRE: Science-Fiction, Animation, Drama, Action & Adventure, Classic Japanese Anime
DESCRIPTION: Set 15 years after a global disaster, Shinji is a teenager growing up in the heavily-fortified city of Tokyo-3. He is recruited by his father to pilot a giant mecha called Evangelion, which he can use to combat enormous alien beasts known as Angels. Shinji soon realizes that Nerv, the organization responsible for building Evangelion, is full of secrets.

TITLE: Pluto (2023)
GENRE: Crime, Animation, Science-Fiction, Mystery & Thriller, Drama, Action & Adventure, Classic Japanese Anime
DESCRIPTION: Sentient humanoid robots and their human creators live in harmony in this futurist world. But when a celebrated robot war hero is murdered, detective Gesicht is put on the case. Tasked with investigating the mystery, Gesicht encounters a plot to kill the most famous robots.

TITLE: Samurai 7 (2004)
GENRE: Animation, Drama, Science-Fiction, Action & Adventure, Classic Japanese Anime
DESCRIPTION: As villages perish under the thumb of a cruel race of warriors, a young priestess named Kirara travels the countryside gathering stray samurais.

TITLE: Samurai Champloo (2004)
GENRE: Action & Adventure, Animation, Comedy, Drama, Mystery & Thriller, Classic Japanese Anime
DESCRIPTION: Break-dancing but fierce warrior Mugen has to deal with the cold-blooded and conceited Jin, a samurai who believes he is above all. These sworn enemies are brought together by Fuu for a special task.

TITLE: Scavengers Reign
GENRE: Drama, Animation, Science-Fiction, Modern Anime
DESCRIPTION: When a deep space freighter is damaged by a solar flare its surviving crew are stranded on a beautiful and unforgiving planet. They begin to learn the true nature of this planet as they try to survive long enough to escape or be rescued.

TITLE: Scott Pilgrim Takes Off (2023)
GENRE: Action & Adventure, Comedy, Science-Fiction, Fantasy, Music & Musical, Romance, Animation, Modern Anime
DESCRIPTION: Scott Pilgrim returns with the entire crew in tow including Ramona Flowers, Wallace Wells, Knives Chau, Stacey Pilgrim, and all of Ramonaâ€™s exes. The bassist for Sex Bob-Omb is back for more adventures and inadvertent lessons in emotional maturity.

TITLE: The disastrous life of Saiki K.
GENRE: Animation, Comedy, Fantasy, Science-Fiction, Classic Japanese Anime
DESCRIPTION: Saiki Kusuo is a powerful psychic who hates attracting attention, yet he is surrounded by colorful characters who always find a way to remove him from his everyday life.

TITLE: The Orbital Children (2022)
GENRE: Action & Adventure, Science-Fiction, Fantasy, Animation, Drama, Classic Japanese Anime
DESCRIPTION: In 2045, two children born on the moon and three kids from Earth try to survive after an accident on their space station leaves them stranded.
